Text: RIGHTEOUS. This has been a hard one to track down> For a year the other torrent was dead. really appreciate it. This guy is the real deal.  thanks

If you or anyone you know is afflicted with any type of cancer, please research into this as it HAS BEEN PROVEN but will NEVER be approved by the FDA.
THIS film is a must watch. You have to see it to believe it, and don't just take someone's opinion for it. Watch this
If you think this guy has cured cancer with his pee extract, you're pretty gullible.

"the first time in history a single scientist, not a pharmaceutical company, will hold the exclusive patent and distribution rights on a paradigm-shifting medical breakthrough."

Jonas Salk, who invented the Polio vaccine, would have been the first if we're counting.

Even more interesting, Salk didn't even try to patent his vaccine because it was so important.  If you don't believe that, ask yourself when was the last time you even heard of someone getting Polio? 

Salk also didn't charge people to test his vaccine, whereas being a Burzynski test subject can cost up to $200,000.  At those prices why even try to prove yourself, endless clinical trials are more profitable.
